actions.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution providing for the return to the Senate of the bill (S. 144) to ensure the continued expansion of international market opportunities in trade, trade in services, and investment for the United States, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides for the return to the Senate of S. 144 (foreign trade barriers).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the return to the Senate of the bill (S. 144) to ensure the continued expansion of international market opportunities in trade, trade in services, and investment for the United States, and for other purposes.
